author: drkovalskyi
body: Modified CSC/DT timing extraction code to handle cases of tracker-only muons. Timing distributions will change since muons that didn't have timing computed before will not have non-zero values. Many fake TrackerMuons have wrong timing, so having significant deviations from zero timing is expected. It's a critical development for high-pileup fake suppression. Needed for 94X.
title: Extract timing for tracker-only muons
